text: The Lieutenant Governor is a constitutional officer of the Commonwealth of Virginia. The Lieutenant Governor is elected every four years along with the Governor and Attorney General. The office is currently held by Republican Winsome Sears. ==Living former lieutenant governors== Lt. Governor Lt. Gubernatorial term Date of birth (and age) Chuck Robb 1978-1982 Douglas Wilder 1986-1990 Don Beyer 1990-1998 Tim Kaine 2002-2006 Bill Bolling 2006-2014 Ralph Northam 2014-2018 Justin Fairfax 2018-2022 ==Other websites== *Lieutenant Governor of Virginia's website *List of past Lieutenant Governors
title: Lieutenant Governor of Virginia
